title: A breakout in the red-hot energy sector is setting up another 20% rally, top technical strategist says
full_text: A breakout in the red-hot energy sector is setting up another 20% rally, top technical strategist says. LPL Financial's Adam Turnquist forecasts a 20% rally for energy as the sector breaks above a key resistance level and macro tailwinds build.. Bad weather and geopolitical turmoil have boosted the energy sector to the top of the stock market leaderboard in 2026, and there could be stronger gains to come. The S&P 500 energy sector is u… [+2008 chars]
